code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[selectedImage,setSelectedImage]=useState(null);const[predictedClass,setPredictedClass]=useState(null);const handleImageChange=e=>{setSelectedImage(e.target.files[0]);};const handleSubmit=async()=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',selectedImage);const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/predict',{method:'POST',body:formData});const data=await response.json();setPredictedClass(data.class);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center mt-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:handleImageChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,className:"mt-4 p-2 bg-blue-500 text-white",children:"\u041E\u0442\u043F\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C"}),predictedClass&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"mt-4 text-xl",children:["\u041A\u043B\u0430\u0441\u0441: ",predictedClass]})]});}export default App;
